text:
Hi, 
Since Nov23, seems updates are not showing under needed in WSUS like Security
Monthly Quality Rollup for Nov & Dec (KB5033420, KB5033249 etc). Though these
KB’s are there in Microsoft Update Catalog. 
Is it because of the Windows Server 2012 r2 EOLS or something else? 
Generally in WSUS, I used status as “Failed or Needed”. 
Regards, 
Dhiraj Haritwal 
--
%40KL1PR0401MB4627.apcprd04.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: Windows Server 2012 r2 Update Sync in WSUS
